abstract: The oil company said that John S. Watson, currently vice chairman, will serve as chairman and chief executive, succeeding David J. O’Reilly.
snippet: The oil company said that John S. Watson, currently vice chairman, will serve as chairman and chief executive, succeeding David J. O’Reilly.
lead_paragraph: The Chevron Corporation said Wednesday that its vice chairman, John S. Watson, would become chairman and chief executive when David J. O’Reilly retires from those positions at the end of this year.

headline.main: Chevron Names Successor as Its Chief Steps Down
headline.print_headline: Chevron Names Successor As Its Chief Steps Down
